home.heroSubtitle: ACME Studios crafts websites and apps that are fast, secure, and globally distributed by default.
home.ctaBlockBody: We'll scope, prototype, and ship — fast!
home.testimonialsSubtitle: See what our clients say about working with ACME Studios
home.testimonial1Quote: ACME Studios transformed our legacy platform into a blazing-fast edge-native application. Load times dropped by 60% and our users love it.
home.testimonial2Quote: The team's expertise in Cloudflare Workers and modern architecture helped us scale globally without breaking the bank. Best investment we made.
home.testimonial3Quote: From design to deployment, ACME Studios delivered ahead of schedule. Their attention to performance and security is unmatched.
home.servicesSubtitle: Enterprise-grade solutions for modern web applications
home.service1Desc: End-to-end application development with modern frameworks.
home.service2Desc: Scalable, secure APIs built for performance.
home.service3Desc: Cloud infrastructure that scales with your business.
home.whyChooseUsSubtitle: We combine cutting-edge technology with proven expertise to deliver exceptional results
home.benefit1Desc: Edge-native architecture delivers <100ms response times globally with automatic scaling.
home.benefit2Desc: Built-in DDoS protection, zero-trust architecture, and automated security scanning.
home.benefit3Desc: Deploy to 300+ cities worldwide instantly with Cloudflare's global network.
home.benefit4Desc: Pay only for what you use with serverless architecture. No server maintenance costs.
home.benefit5Desc: From concept to production in weeks, not months. Agile methodology and CI/CD.
home.benefit6Desc: Real-time monitoring, APM, distributed tracing, and analytics out of the box.

about.title: About ACME Studios
about.intro: We're a boutique web agency focused on speed, security, and delightful UX. We build on Cloudflare — Workers for compute, D1 for data, KV for global state — so your app is close to users everywhere.
about.missionDesc: Ship world-class digital experiences with edge-native tech.
about.missionIntro: We help organizations move faster by pairing elegant design with edge-native engineering. Our goals:
about.missionGoal1: Deliver measurable performance gains for every launch.
about.missionGoal2: Build systems that are secure by default and simple to operate.
about.missionGoal3: Champion accessibility and inclusive design in all user journeys.
about.missionGoal4: Share knowledge openly to uplift the community.
about.teamDesc: Designers, engineers, and product folks who love details.
about.methodologyDesc: A proven approach to deliver exceptional results.
about.methodologyIntro: We follow a structured yet flexible process to ensure every project exceeds expectations:
about.methodologyStep1: Discovery & Strategy — We start by understanding your goals, users, and technical requirements through collaborative workshops.
about.methodologyStep2: Design & Prototyping — Our designers create interactive prototypes that bring your vision to life, validated through user testing.
about.methodologyStep3: Development & Integration — We build with modern edge-native technologies, ensuring performance, security, and scalability from day one.
about.methodologyStep4: Testing & Optimization — Rigorous testing across devices, accessibility audits, and performance optimization before launch.
about.methodologyStep5: Launch & Support — Smooth deployment with monitoring, documentation, and ongoing support to ensure long-term success.
